title: Upcoming Sports Event
description: There will be a sports event in the school playground next Friday. All students are encouraged to participate.

title: Exam Schedule
description: The final exams for this semester will start from 10th August. Please make sure to prepare well.

title: Holiday Notice
description: School will remain closed on 15th August due to Independence Day.

title: Parent-Teacher Meeting
description: There will be a parent-teacher meeting on 20th August at 3:00 PM. Kindly attend to discuss your child's progress.

title: Scholarship Opportunity
description: A scholarship opportunity for outstanding students is available. Interested candidates can apply before 31st August.

title: Classroom Change
description: Please note that the 9th-grade class will now be held in Room 203 instead of Room 105.

title: Annual Day Celebration
description: The school's annual day will be celebrated on 5th September. Don't miss the exciting cultural performances!

title: Academic Excellence Awards
description: The academic excellence awards ceremony will be held on 12th September to recognize outstanding achievements.

title: General Notice
description: Students are reminded to submit their project reports before the deadline.

title: Art Competition
description: Calling all budding artists! An art competition will be held on 25th September. Get your creativity flowing!

title: School Picnic
description: The annual school picnic will take place on 1st October. Don't forget to bring your picnic baskets and enjoy the day!

title: Math Olympiad
description: Interested students can participate in the Math Olympiad. The competition will be held on 5th October.

title: Basketball Tournament
description: A basketball tournament will be organized from 10th to 15th October. Form your teams and register now!

title: Teacher's Day Celebration
description: On 15th October, we will celebrate Teacher's Day to honor our dedicated teachers. Students can show their appreciation with cards and gifts.

title: Mid-Term Break
description: School will remain closed from 18th to 22nd October for the mid-term break. Enjoy your holidays!

title: Science Fair
description: The annual science fair will be held on 30th October. Students can showcase their science projects and experiments.

title: Career Counseling Session
description: A career counseling session will be conducted on 5th November. Experts will guide students on various career paths.

title: Inter-School Debate Competition
description: An inter-school debate competition will be hosted on 10th November. Prepare your arguments and represent our school!

title: Annual Sports Day
description: Mark your calendars for the Annual Sports Day on 20th November. Get ready for a day filled with fun and sportsmanship!
